string-array.name: help_faq_topic
string-array.item: Why do I not receive any push notification?
Why are scores in push notifications are different from Live Scores and Match Info pages?
Why are some competitions updated slowly?
What is the difference between mute and disabled in settings?
What is the meaning of notification icon with ‘star’ in the middle?
How are matches sorted in Live Scores page?
How to filter competition in Live Scores page?
What are the benefits of favorite team?
What are the benefits of favorite competition?
How can I subscribe to matches, teams, or competitions?
Why do some teams not have icons?
How can I report bugs or request features?

string-array.name: help_faq_messages_00
string-array.item: *Please ensure that notifications are enabled in settings.

*For pre-3.0 devices notifications require “Google Play Store”, and it must have at least one logged in Google account. A Google account is not a requirement on devices running Android 4.0.4 or higher.

string-array.name: help_faq_messages_01
string-array.item: *We have separated server for push notifications to deliver the results as soon as possible, so sometimes the scores in push notifications are updated faster than Live Scores and Match Info pages.

string-array.name: help_faq_messages_02
string-array.item: *It depends on the competition because some are updated haft time or after the match has finished. We will try our best to keep updating the up-to-the-minute results.

string-array.name: help_faq_messages_03
string-array.item: *When ‘mute’ is turned on, you will still receive push notification but there will be no vibration and alert sound.
*If ‘disabled’ is set, you will not receive push notification at all.

string-array.name: help_faq_messages_04
string-array.item: *Notification with ‘star’ means you subscribed to competition in which the match is played, or subscribed to the team which plays in that match.

string-array.name: help_faq_messages_05
string-array.item: *Favorite team and favorite competition are shown first, then, they are sorted alphabetically.
*For TODAY, YESTERDAY and TOMORROW, the matches are sorted in UTC Time.

string-array.name: help_faq_messages_07
string-array.item: *Favorite team will be at the top of the list on Live Scores page.
*Besides, it is easier for you to find your favorite team on My Team page.

string-array.name: help_faq_messages_08
string-array.item: *Favorite competition will be at the top of the list on Live Scores page.
*Besides, it is easier for you to find your favorite competition on Favorite sub-page in Filter Competition page, as well as Select Competition page.

string-array.name: help_faq_messages_09
string-array.item: *On Live Scores page press @ on match you want to subscribe
*On Match Info page press @ to subscribe to the current match
*On Live Scores page long press on the match > press @ > subscribe team that you want
*On Team Info page press @ to subscribe to the current team
*On My Teams page press @ to subscribe to team
*Note: When you subscribe to team all matches that play by the team are going to subscribe automantically
*On Live Scores page long press on the competition > press @
*On Filter Competitions page press @ on competition you want to subscribe
*Note: When you subscribe to competition all matches in the competition are going to subscribe automantically

string-array.name: help_faq_messages_10
string-array.item: *The icons of some teams cannot be displayed. We will try our best to find it.

string-array.name: change_log
string-array.item: *Improve TV Schedule UI (available on some countries)
*Able to share Live scores and match info
*Our WebApp is now on beta, visit superscores.com! We welcome your comments/suggestions
*Temporary remove TV Schedule for some countries due to copyright issue
*Introducing World Cup mode, easily follow World Cup in just a tap!
*News push notification for team and competition
*Fix filter competitions not working for some devices
*NOTE: The features release schedule may be changed
*Bring back news widget with a lot more competitions
*Press on selected tab to navigate among tabs faster
*Add option to hide right index bar on Live Scores page
*Rewrite Push Notification from the ground up to enhance performance and stability
*Selectable Push Notification type e.g. goal score, start/end (more will come very soon)
*Live scores now support up to 16 days
*Add capability to share Commentary and Editorial
*Add player transfers for competitions and teams
*Add option to sort match by alphabet or time
*Fix application always force update on some devices
*Add French, Italian, Portuguese, and Russian translation
*Fix crash bugs for low-dpi screen devices
*Add more match statistics (attacks, dangerous attacks, free kicks, goal kick, shots block, shots woodwork, throw ins)
*Add German translation, thanks to Nils Wasser!
*Can separate notifications sound for Favorite Team!
*Fix pinned matches duplicated on Live Scores page
*Add matches reminder to calendar by long pressing at the match
*Pin matches to the top of Live Scores page!
